messages.title: Protecting frontline services, supporting our schools and hospitals

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Since 1997 Labour's investment has grown over 60 times faster than under the Tories (1979-97). Prefers a comprehensive service within one week of referral, doubled the number of heart and stroke patients alive within 30 days.
Provided new school buildings, delivering finest education. Committed to sure start and lifelong learning.

To help hard working families, Labour has increased the child element in tax credits, which will now rise to £250 above inflation. Also reduced the level of income at which family credit is fully withdrawn - helping thousands of low income families.

issues.economy: We have made sure that interest rates are kept at an all time low. This has given many people a boost to their household income. Under the Tories interest rates reached double figures.
issues.education: Provided new school buildings, delivering finest education. Committed to sure start and lifelong learning.
issues.health: Since 1997 Labour's investment has grown over 60 times faster than under the Tories (1979-97). Prefers a comprehensive service within one week of referral, doubled the number of heart and stroke patients alive within 30 days.
issues.socialWelfare: The increased State Pension, increased Pension Credit along with the Winter Fuel Allowance can help make pensioners up to £2100 better off.

housing.content: Under Labour the Ricoh Arena and University Hospital were built. Local Tory incompetence is now holding up plans for the Ricoh Railway Station and other major developments.

contactInformation.address: Transport House, Short Street, Coventry, CV1 2LS

endorsements.endorsement: As a local GP I have seen the NHS transformed, thanks to Labour we are seeing shorter waiting lists and more doctors and nurses.

quotes.text: As a local GP I have seen the NHS transformed, thanks to Labour we are seeing shorter waiting lists and more doctors and nurses.

Geoffrey Robinson at Coventry's new University Hospital
